I tainia mas metaferei sti mageftiki poli tou Rio Nte Tzaneiro kai sto ploysio tropiko dasos tis Vrazilias kai exei ws irwa ton Mplou, enan papagalo toso spanio pou pisteyei oti einai o teleftaios tou eidous tou. Otan omws anakalyptei oti yparxei ki allos san ki afton- kai malista thilykoy genous- afinei to voliko klouvi tou sti mikri poli tis Minesota kai petaei gia to Rio. Alla, opws apodeiknyetai, o oikositos Mplou kai i entelws aneksartiti papagalina Tzoyel den deixnoun na einai ftiagmenoi o enas gia ton allon. Aprosdokita tha vrethoyn mazi gia na zisoun mia peripeteia-empeiria zwis, kata ti diarkeia tis opoias mathainoun polla gia ti filia, tin agapi, to tharros kai tis prokliseis tis zwis.
